text.text_translated: Scary films love empty places. These places can be an old hospital. They can be an empty house. Or they can be an old town with no people. There is something special about these empty places. You think about the people who lived there. Why did they leave? These places are very quiet. This can be scary too. Film makers like these places for another reason. It is easy to believe your phone does not work there.
